column1: [MacMahon] Mavs had four players out due to health and safety protocols -- Jalen Brunson, Dorian Finney-Smith, Josh Richardson and Maxi Kleber -- and did not add any due to contact tracing after Kleber's positive test yesterday. That means at least five more Mavs entered protocols today.
[Charania] Mavericks’ players quarantined due to health and safety protocols: Josh Richardson, Dorian Finney-Smith, Jalen Brunson.

[MacMahon] The Mavs’ practice facility has been shut down after the team’s second positive test in three days, sources said. Maxi Kleber started self-isolation this morning. Jalen Brunson, Dorian Finney-Smith and Josh Richardson still quarantining in Denver. Contact tracing being done now.

[Townsend] Jalen Brunson, Dorian Finney-Smith and Josh Richardson are the Mavericks who are out due to COVID-19 "health and safety protocols." It's not clear which one of them tested positive for the virus
[Charania] Mavericks’ players quarantined due to health and safety protocols: Josh Richardson, Dorian Finney-Smith, Jalen Brunson.
[Olson] : Jalen Smith had 18 points in 15 minutes this morning. Played the backup 5 in G-League run
[Olson] : With lack of opportunity with Ayton/Saric/Kaminsky taking all minutes at the 5, Jalen Smith had 18 points in 15 minutes this morning in G-League run
Suns assign rookie Jalen Smith to G League
[Olson] Monty Williams said the team will make an announcement on Jalen Smith. He didn't want to speak for him.
With Ayton/Saric/Kaminsky taking all the minutes at the 5 this season, Jalen Smith was sent to the G-League. Smith had 18 points in 15 minutes this morning.
Jalen “Stix” Smith puts an exclamation point on his rookie of the year campaign, putting up a double double with 11 points and 10 rebounds
Suns fans, is that Jalen Smith a bad pick or a good prospect?
Jalen Smith, who was drafted by the Suns with the 10th pick in the 2020 draft, tonight: 17 points and 12 rebounds, and the W!

[Sidery] Two names to keep an eye on if the Suns decide to package together Dario Saric and Jalen Smith to bolster their bench unit even further: Thaddeus Young & Larry Nance

[Scotto] Keep an eye on Jalen Smith, who’s been made available by the Suns according to multiple sources around the league. Nets have some interest in former lottery pick Stanley Johnson. Bulls interested in Ennis and Millsap.
[Smith] In moves designed to get players to the Greensboro Swarm of the G League, the Charlotte Hornets have waived DJ Carton and Xavier Sneed and signed Jalen Crutcher and Cameron McGriff.
